title: Printing press impacts - causes and effects

content.question: Directions: Answer all parts of the following question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Sources have been edited for the purposes of this exercise. For the period 1452–1500, identify and explain ONE cause that contributed to the geographical distribution of printing centers in Europe shown on the map. For the period 1500–1550, identify and explain ONE short-term cultural or political effect of the emergence of printing centers such as the ones shown on the map. For the period 1550–1789, identify and explain ONE long-term effect of the spread of printing on European society.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
